tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a sepulchral monument. With alternative suggestions.", 1830–50.
1830–50. Pencil, gray and brown watercolor. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6888-a.
